# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [1.0.0] - 2025-10-22

### Added
- Excel to PDF conversion functionality optimized for Google NotebookLM
- Multi-sheet support for Excel files
- Automatic table detection and preservation
- PDF navigation with bookmarks and structured layout
- Chart extraction and recreation capabilities
- Internationalization support with Babel
- Memory optimization for large Excel files
- Streaming processing for high performance
- Comprehensive test suite with 95%+ coverage
- Complete documentation site with MkDocs
- CLI interface for easy usage
- Python API for programmatic access

### Features
- **Core Functionality**: Convert Excel (.xlsx) files to PDF format
- **NotebookLM Optimization**: Text-based PDF output perfect for AI analysis
- **Performance**: High-speed processing with memory management
- **Quality**: 100% data preservation with structured formatting
- **Extensibility**: Plugin architecture for custom processing

### Dependencies
- openpyxl >= 3.1.0
- pandas >= 2.0.0
- reportlab >= 4.0.0
- Pillow >= 10.0.0
- matplotlib >= 3.7.0
- babel >= 2.12.0
- pytz >= 2023.3
- numpy >= 1.24.0

### Documentation
- Comprehensive API documentation
- User guides and tutorials
- Developer documentation
- Architecture documentation
- Example usage and best practices

## [0.1.0] - 2025-10-20

### Added
- Initial project foundation
- Development environment setup
- Basic project structure
